alert.note: Alert for Coastal Camden; Coastal Glynn; Inland Glynn; Wayne (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 10 at 2:57PM EST by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT GLYNN AND SOUTHEASTERN WAYNE COUNTIES THROUGH 345 PM EST... At 257 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms capable of producing a landspout along a line extending from near Gardi to Everett to 6 miles northeast of Waverly. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts and wind gusts around 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Brunswick, St. Simons Island, Dock Junction, Gardi, St Simons Island Village, Country Club Estates, Thalmann, Sea Island, Everett, and Doctortown. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Camden; Coastal Glynn; Inland Glynn; Wayne
